about_the_game:
Broken Time - a world where time no longer matters. This low-polygon action game immerses players in a post-apocalyptic landscape where every move changes the course of events. Fight and gather resources to survive in this madness.
The game is an adventure where each level becomes unique due to randomly generated spawn weapons on level. An important feature is the time system - it moves only when the player moves, which allows you to plan your actions and make strategic decisions in real time.

Features of Broken Time:

  • Combat: Engage in battles with enemies at a unique pace where every second can be decisive.

  • Item Hunting: Collect items and weapons to fight against foes.

  • Unique Time Mechanics: Use your movements for dodging and maneuvering, altering the flow of battle in your favor, as time only moves when you do.

  • Random Items: every level is a new experience, with random items scattered throughout, making each playthrough unique.

  • Enemy Shatter Effects: Defeat enemies and watch them break into shards upon death, adding a dynamic visual effect to combat.

  • Atmospheric Music: Immerse yourself in the game with a captivating musical score that enhances the overall experience and sets the tone for your adventure.

Broken Time it's a challenge for those ready to defy time.

content_descriptors.notes:
Broken Time - includes elements of violence and brutal combat mechanics. Players use various weapons, including piercing and cutting tools, to fight enemies, which disintegrate into fragments upon death. These scenes are accompanied by bloody visual effects and intense destruction animations, which may be inappropriate for more sensitive players.

The weapons in the game have varying degrees of destructive power, making each fight unique and dangerous. There are also firearms and piercing weapons such as machetes. Enemies are inflicted with serious damage, including bloody effects and shattering into fragments, which creates vivid and visually impressive scenes.
